history.proof: intros H. hauto use: Rbar_glb_subset, Rbar_le_antisym.

original: intros H. unfold Rbar_glb. apply PropExtensionalityFacts.PropExt_and_PropFunExt_iff_PredExt. intros x. split. - intros H1. apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with (E1:=E1) (E2:=E2) in H1; auto. - intros H2. apply Rbar_is_glb_ext with (E1:=E2) (E2:=E1) in H2; auto.
